values: 下沉；使下沉；使沉没；沉没；降低；下陷；使失败；倒下挖；掘（深坑、深洞）；埋入；（高尔夫球）击球入洞；猛喝
水槽；（厨房里的）；洗碗槽；洼地；低洼地；沉降区；渗坑；汇集处
位于社会条件差的贫穷地区的；贫民窟的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 沉没的；凹陷的；比周围低的
铅锤；铅坠；[矿业] 凿井工；下沉的人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指物体从一定高度落下。
与drop同义，指突然或猛烈地降落，但fall也可指任何下落，同高度或形式无关。
指在空气或水中垂直下降、下沉。
通常指沿斜线或斜坡下降。

word_group.brief_definition: 不自救, 必沉沦；自己努力, 以求生存；不论成败
厨房洗涤池；激进现实主义的
过多的东西, 大量的东西
积极而富成效地工作；专注于
电流沉；电流吸收；电流吸收器
嵌入的水槽；固定的水箱；嵌装的水池

bilingual.source: Spit the water from your mouth into the sink.
bilingual.target: 把嘴里的水吐到水槽里。

bilingual.source: I love to wash my dirty hands at the kitchen sink.
bilingual.target: 我喜欢在厨房水槽洗脏手。

bilingual.source: The dustpan is kept under the sink.
He piled the plates in the sink.
bilingual.target: 他把盘子堆积在水槽里。

bilingual.source: Clean the gunk off the kitchen sink.
bilingual.target: 清理厨房水槽上的污垢。

bilingual.source: The sink is clogged with food particles.
bilingual.target: 水槽被食物残渣堵塞了。

bilingual.source: The sink is chocked with food particles.
bilingual.target: 水槽被食物残渣堵塞了。

bilingual.source: Don't let grease clog the kitchen sink.
bilingual.target: 不要让油脂阻塞厨房水槽。

bilingual.source: There was a pile of dirty dishes in the sink.

list.abstract: sink是一个网络技术术语，在无线传感器网络指汇聚结点，主要负责传感器网与外网（eg,gprs， internet等）的连接，可看作网关节点。

yingyinNormal.en: You can spill. In the sink.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以打翻东西啊，在水槽里。

yingyinNormal.en: In the restroom, ventilation panel above the sink. Cell phone detonator. Are we done？
yingyinNormal.zh: 在厕所水槽上方的通风板那，引爆器是手机，行了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: This camper van has everything. This button works the sink. Wow. And this button works the TV.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这辆露营车什么都有。这个按钮可以控制水槽。哇！这个按钮可以开电视。

yingyinNormal.en: George is going to fill the teapot with water. George has found a spider in the sink. George wants the spider to be his friend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治要把茶壶灌满水，乔治在水槽里找到了蜘蛛，他想要蜘蛛做他的朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, so, Howard, what's the bathroom situation gonna be? Well, there's a sink out there that takes care of half your problems.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德，所以我的浴室是怎么样？外面有个水槽，能帮你解决你一半的问题。

yingyinNormal.en: So, kitchen sink, cabinets are going in after the weekend. It's coming together, though. Shaping up really nice, don't you think?
yingyinNormal.zh: 厨房的水槽，还有橱柜周末后就会到。一起送过来的。目前一切进展顺利吧。

yingyinNormal.en: But this ship can't sink.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这艘船不会沉。

yingyinNormal.en: Put them over there in the sink.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放到水池那边。

yingyinNormal.en: Rocks have no fear. And they sink.
yingyinNormal.zh: 石头没有恐惧，但会沉下去。

yingyinNormal.en: And not in the sink. We each have special buckets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且还不能在水池子里洗，所以我们各有一个特制的小桶。

yingyinNormal.en: I refuse to sink to his level. You can't sink. With all that helium in you, you're lucky you don't float away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我才不要堕落到他那种水准。你落不了，体内充满了氦气，遇水不飘走就算你走运啦。

yingyinNormal.en: I've come to find you, rubber ducky. I know where you are, you're in the sink. Oh. The rubber duck is not in the sink. I know, you are hiding under the table.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我马上就来找你了，橡皮鸭子。我知道你藏在哪里，你在水池里，没有。橡皮鸭子不在水池里，我知道了，你一定藏在桌子下面了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, I've been looking for something to really sink my teeth into.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，好吧，我是来看看能不能找到一些我真正能下得去口的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm going to pause to let that sink in. Okay, I think I understand. You do?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我暂停一下，以便你想一下。我想我听懂了。真的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Let the U-boats sink the convoy. Look, it's been a big day maybe you're suffering from...
yingyinNormal.zh: 让德军潜艇攻击海军部。听着，今天发生了太多事情，也许你……

yingyinNormal.en: You'll drop them into the sea. Sink or swim. They're tied up! Exactly! Now there is context.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要把他们扔进海里。或沉或游。他们被绑住了！没错，背景设置好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you buy generic ketchup, forget to rinse the sink, talk to him through the bathroom door?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你买了三无番茄酱？忘了洗水池？还是隔着厕所门同他讲话？

yingyinNormal.en: Bye, Plant. Bye, Chair number one. Bye, Chair number two. Bye, Table. Bye, wardrobe. Bye, sink. Bye-bye, Skylight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜拜，植物，拜拜，一号椅子，拜拜，二号椅子，拜拜，桌子，拜拜，衣柜，拜拜，洗手池，拜拜，天窗。

yingyinNormal.en: Back on the west coast, watch the sun sink into the North Pacific Ocean like a glowing ball of fire on Hapuna Beach.
yingyinNormal.zh: 回到西岸，在哈普那海滩上看着太阳如火球般的沉入北太平洋中。

yingyinNormal.en: Amazing. It floats. You sound surprised. Yes, usually they sink on the first go. Now we can go for our day on the river.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太神奇了，这艘船。你好像很惊讶嘛。是的，一般情况下第一次会沉下去的。现在，我们可以做着这个船去出游了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 下沉; 下陷; 坐下

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Helping forests flourish as valuable "carbon <highlight>sinks</highlight>" long into the future may require reducing their capacity to absorb carbon now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帮助森林在未来很长一段时间内作为有价值的“碳汇”蓬勃发展，可能需要降低它们现在吸收碳的能力。

examination_example.sentence: To maintain forests as valuable "carbon <highlight>sinks</highlight>," we may need to lower their present carbon-absorbing capacity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了保持森林作为宝贵的“碳汇”，我们可能需要降低它们目前的碳吸收能力。

sense_info_list.en: go down below the surface of something
sense_info_list.zh: 下沉; 下陷; 坐下

sense_info_list.en: gradually decrease or decline in value, amount; to become quieter

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: go down below the surface of something
gradually decrease or decline in value, amount

examination_example.sentence: Stock prices rose or <highlight>sank</highlight> according to his pronouncements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 股票价格根据他的声明上涨或下跌。

sense_info_list.en: insert beneath a surface by digging or hollowing out
fall into a particular state or condition, typically one that is unwelcome or unpleasant

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

sense_info_list.en: go down below the surface of something

examination_example.sentence: His good luck charm <highlight>sank</highlight> into the sea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的幸运符沉入了大海。

examination_example.sentence: How to keep the village from <highlight>sinking</highlight> into the sea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如何防止村庄沉入大海。

sense_info_list.en: gradually decrease or decline in value; amount
fall into a particular state or condition; typically one that is unwelcome or unpleasant

examination_example.sentence: For instance, you can move a TV to the kitchen and watch your favorite shows while you're standing at the <highlight>sink</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，你可以把电视移到厨房，站在水槽边看你最喜欢的节目。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: go down below the surface of something

examination_example.sentence: Jenna threw the burnt piece into the <highlight>sink</highlight> and put in the other slice of bread.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Jenna把烧焦的面包片扔进水槽，然后放进另一片面包。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: go down below the surface of something

examination_example.sentence: One day the feelings were told that the island would <highlight>sink</highlight>, so they all made boats and left except Love.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一天，他们被告知小岛会沉没，于是他们都造了船，离开了，除了Love。

examination_example.sentence: As the bowl slowly <highlight>sinks</highlight> (下沉), it pulls a rope that moves a human figure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着碗慢慢下沉，它会拉动一根绳子，绳子会拉动一个人形。

examination_example.sentence: There is an old American saying, "Loose lips <highlight>sink</highlight> ships."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国有句老话：“多嘴船沉”。

examination_example.sentence: And my heart <highlight>sank</highlight> when I saw the wall I was the lastone to try to climb that huge wall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我看到那堵墙时，我的心都沉了下去。我是最后一个试图爬上那堵巨墙的人。
